title: Which is the best article spinner in 2019? - Quora

response.answer_text: I actually have tried a lot of article spinners. So, CleverSpinner is the software that gives me the best impression so far. The difference between this one and other tools is that it is able to understand meaning of the words. Check the pictures to see what the tool is able to do:  It can also spin multiple zipped txt files, using a form like this:  It is not easy to find a software that is able to rewrite content and ensure that it is both unique enough and sufficiently readable. I also proffered tools that are not slow. Because its really difficult for a software to understand actual word meaning, tools are either very simple or very complex. Simple tools to do use AI and are not accurate enough, while the ones that do use AI tends to be very slow. However, this software is optimized so its very fast. Probably the fastest article spinner in 2019 that can do the job very good. You can compare it with free software and you will find that quality of free tools is much worse. This means you will have to spend a lot of time editing the text to make sure its does not sound bad. Because free software makes so many mistakes, you have to check each and every word, so its very slow. Actually its better of to rewrite the text on your own without usage of any software, or use this article spinner as it does not make a mistake. Sometimes there is a word that does not fit 100% naturally, but this is quite rare. There are quite a few levels of quality. The highest quality will have the worst uniqueness and the lowest quality will have the highest uniqueness. So far, it only works for English language. It works in pretty much any browser, I personally use Firefox and Chrome. No need to install any software, just open it in a browser. NLP is quite resource intensive, it requires high end graphic card, so I am really happy that it runs on their servers.I just add text and click spin and in 10-20 sec I get the result.   I forgot to say this earlier, there is a manual mode which you can use to add more synonyms. You can also add your own synonyms, which is find quite handy. Everything is very near, and its clearly explained in FAQ section. Manual rewrite mode is not completely manual, you get the suggestion and you just need to manually choose more synonyms if you want. However, automatic mode is accurate, so I use it pretty much all the time. The software is: Very fast.Very accurate.Uses advanced NLPYou can add your own synonyms into it.It can spin zipped txt files to save you time.
